summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackDermalogica's Skin Smoothing Cream Moisturizer infuses skin with 48 hours of hydration and protects against environmental stress. A dynamic hyaluronic acid complex with mallow, cucumber and arnica distributes hydration throughout the skin, helping to lock in moisture.
details: DetailsBenefitsWeightlessly hydratesFormulated with natural-antioxidant grape seed extract, Vitamin C, and Vitamin E to give a smoothing effect while shielding skin from the harmful effects of stress and free radical damageProvides 48 hours of continuous hydration by locking in moistureBest-selling moisturizer leaves skin with a plump and supple complexionBest for those concerned with fine lines and wrinkles, dryness, dullness and uneven textureKey IngredientsMallow: provides natural moisturizing and soothing propertiesArnica: nourishing and has anti-inflammatory propertiesLactic Acid: helps hydrate the skinResearch ResultsDelivers 48 hours continuous hydrationItem 2536765How To UseApply over face and neck in light, upward strokes.Tip: Boost Skin Smoothing Cream with a few drops of Skin Hydrating Booster for extra hydration (sold separately).IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ethylhexyl Hydroxystearate, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Palmitic Acid, Dimethicone, PEG-8, Stearic Acid, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Aloe Barbadensis Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Saccharide Isomerate, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Hedera Helix (Ivy) Extract, Malva Sylvestris (Mallow) Flower Extract, Parietaria Officinalis Extract, Sambucus Nigra Flower Extract, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Trehalose, Algin, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Serine, Linoleic Acid, Phospholipids, Phytosterols, Cananga Odorata Flower Oil, Urea, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Pullulan, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Hexanediol, Pentylene Glycol, Glyceryl Polyacrylate, Sodium Citrate, Disodium Phosphate, Palmitoyl Hydroxypropyltrimonium Amylopectin/Glycerin Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Potassium Phosphate, Citric Acid, Tocopherol, Methylpropanediol, Polysorbate 60, Panthenol, Polyquaternium-10, Cetyl Alcohol, PEG-100 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Aminomethyl Propanol, Carbomer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Hydroxide, Hydroxystearic Acid, Myristic Acid, BHT, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply over face and neck in light, upward strokes.Tip: Boost Skin Smoothing Cream with a few drops of Skin Hydrating Booster for extra hydration (sold separately).
ingredients: Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Extract

reviews.headline: A must have
reviews.comments: This moisturizer makes my skin feel so hydrated and refreshed. Love it!

reviews.headline: My special treat to myself
reviews.comments: After using Dermatologica for years I'll always be there best fan. People have asked me what I use and I'm quick to tell them.

reviews.headline: What a ridiculous price jump, Dermalogica.
reviews.comments: Dermalogica, you shoukd be ashamed. Your proce has consustently increased i er the last decade, doubling since I began using it. Why?

reviews.headline: Love this product!!
reviews.comments: Dermalogica Skin Smoothing Cream is one of the best moisturizers I have ever used. It leaves my skin feeling soft and hydrated, without a greasy feeling.

reviews.headline: Horrible Breakouts
reviews.comments: I recently got a facial and was chatting with my esthetician about moisturizers. I typically use the Drunk Elephant moisturizer, I have never had any issues with it but after my facial I thought I would look into something different. I have normal skin, not too dry not too oily. Within a couple of days I had horrible deep breakouts under my skin and something that looked like a rash down my neck. I know everyones skin reacts differently but this was not for me. Returned and went back to my drunk elephant.

reviews.headline: This is my go to moisturizer.
reviews.comments: I love this moisturizer. My esthetician suggested I use this to balance my combination skin, and it has been really helpful! It's definitely a better option than the benefit porefessional I was using before.

reviews.headline: Fine, but…
reviews.comments: This is a fine moisturizer but my skin is no smoother after 9 months of daily use. Probably not worth the price.

reviews.headline: Best, long lasting moisturizer for dry skin
reviews.comments: I'm very impressed with how long my face stayed moisturized. All night! Wish it was more affordable however

reviews.headline: Skin blurring
reviews.comments: This product makes my skin look soooo smooth. It is not greasy at all and my makeup goes on top of it perfectly.

reviews.headline: Works well for me
reviews.comments: This moisturizer works good for me. I am extremely oily and it's more like a lotion and it leaves my skin soft and supple and it brightens my skin which is dull.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments:
I've only been using this product for about a week and bought thr travel size to try it out, but I can tell already my skin has never felt and looked better! For about over a year I have been struggling with my face (ezcema, acene, other dry spots, discoloration) and Cerave products were my holy grail, until it wasn't, since then I have tried numerous products, spent $$$$ and nothing work. For the last 3-4months I have been using La Roche Posay face wash & face moisturizer and its been blah. I have only been using it bc i refused to try something else and spend more money. Finally, my sister suggested Dermalogica and OMG!! All this time I had been suffering. I bought the travel size to test it out bc the full size are pricey, but let me tell you, I don't care they are expensive anymore. I have already purchased the full size products and have a full regimen for my facs. Like I said, 

I've only been using the face mositurizer, face wash, the blue bottle exfoliter (twice a week), and the brightening kit (only at night) (all travel size) and my face looks & feels amazing. 

These are expensive products, but theres a spanish saying "lo bueno cuesta", in english "the good things cost" and with these products, I can agree. Also, a little bit really goes a long way. For the face wash, I only use a pea size and its really more than enough and prettu much same off all other products.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: It moisturized my face so good. Unfortunately, i cant stand the bad smell…its so bad!

reviews.headline: Finally!
reviews.comments: I am 48 and have been bouncing around forever trying to find the perfect cream for my combination skin.  A little goes a long way.  No greasy residue and moisturizes my dry spots all day long.  My skin is smooth and fine lines are completely blurred after a few weeks of use. Best cream out there for my skin.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: I enjoy the smell it reminds me of baby lotion. My skin has never looked so hydrated until this product. I don't think I will ever try after moisturizer.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again and again!
Definite buy
reviews.comments: Smooth on no residue. Leaves your face feeling moisturized without an oily finish. Great size for travel.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: I'm disappointed becaude thevreason i got this dacial moisturizer is because i remember getting a facial dobe at a spa in the wibtertime a few years ago and this is the moisturizer they used. Not sure uf the formula changed or its just me but it definitely does not feel the same on my face as i remember. I remember being very hydrated and moisturized when i was given the facial, even the next day, whereas when i put this on, it feels like it disappears right away. On top of that, it is very scented like soa, which I don't like walking around and smelling my face all day. On top of that, as soon as i put on the moisturizer, it made my eyes feel the smallest sensation of burning a little bit. Will not be reourchasing again.

reviews.headline: My absolute favorite
reviews.comments: This is my favorite dermalogica moisturizer! This is probably my favorite skin care brand!! Pricey but totally work it!

reviews.headline: Product Stinks
reviews.comments: This moisturizer is very hydrating. I do not think I will be using it though due to the smell, it smells horrible like mildew. If it smelled better I'd definitely recommend.

reviews.headline: Dermalogica pro collagen banking serum
reviews.comments: These ingredients are amazing!!! I am 100% a fan. I have aging skin and after 5 nights of this in a row, I feel like I have a little glow! I already have been using their cleaner and love it, so this is a nice touch for after that. This was offered by dermalogica to review, and I'll be buying it again! FOR PRO COLLAGEN BANKING SERUM

I would buy this product again

amazing ♥️
media.caption: my skin after using dermalogica. i hate my skin. but this brought me confidence again! thank you

media.headline: My best cream ever! I use this cream every day!

faceoff_positive.comments: I cannot replace this product, I have tried to look for others because this one is a bit pricey, but I can't find anything else like it, and more than willing to pay the price for this amazing product. It's non greasy, and evaporates into your skin, other natural products i have used fell like i'm wearing a maski love this product so much and am so thankful for it!
faceoff_positive.headline: Best Product I have ever used

faceoff_negative.comments: I love this product. It made my skin feel so enriched and smooth. BUT!!! It made me break out worse than when I was a teenager! Even a month after switching back to my regular moisturizer, my skin hasn't gone back to how it was before. It's horrible! So even though I love the product, I can not use it. It's such a shame because it smells and feels amazing, but my skin cannot handle the oil base and I'm even worse off now because I'm still breaking out almost a month after using it (I had only used this product for about 2-3 weeks). Too bad.
faceoff_negative.headline: I love it but... HORRIBLE breakouts!
